de.intarsys.security.smartcard.card

Interface ICardTransmitter

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ICardConnection
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommonCardConnection, CommonCardTransmitter, RequestChainingCardTransmitter, StandardCardConnection

    public interface ICardTransmitter
    An object that can transmit APDUs from/to an ICard.

    This is typically provided by ICardConnection . Another option is daisy chaining the ICardTransmitter to implement SM or other decorations.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ResponseAPDU transmit(RequestAPDU request)
      Transmit an APDU .
